trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabChanged" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabChanged> event occurs when the user selects a new property tab in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabChanged> evento ocorre quando o usuário seleciona uma nova guia de propriedade no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyTabChangedEventArgs> provides data on the old tab and new tab being selected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyTabChangedEventArgs> fornece dados na guia antigo e novo guia está sendo selecionada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> named `PropertyGrid1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> chamado `PropertyGrid1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyTabChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: The Previously selected property tab.
trans-unit.target: A guia de propriedade selecionada Anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: The newly selected property tab.
trans-unit.target: A guia de propriedade recém-selecionada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyTabChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyTabChangedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" /> selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" /> selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The newly selected <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" />.
trans-unit.target: O recém-selecionada <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the old <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" /> selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o antigo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" /> selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The old <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" /> that was selected.
trans-unit.target: O antigo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab" /> que foi selecionado.
